level.text: A fifty dollars ($50.00) fee shall be imposed on any person who gives or causes to be given in payment of any tax, assessment, fee, charge, or other obligation due the District of Columbia, a check which is dishonored or not duly paid.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: The authority for this section is the Dishonored Check Collection Fee Act of 1981, as amended, D.C. Law 4-16 (codified at D.C. Code ยง 1-357 (1999 Repl.).
